channel.title: Half life Win 7 start menu icon
channel.description:
Not exactly to show off but I did sorta toss together this Half life icon as a replacement Windows 7 start button.
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png) Right click to save
However before you jump too far read this article: [url='https://www.itechtalk.com/thread6574.html']https://www.itechtalk.com/thread6574.html[/url]
It has full instructions. It is a bit of work to do this. But if you want to mess around more with W7 start menu buttons this is a start.
[COLOR='Red']Note: If you are using x64 Windows you NEED to use [url='https://angusj.com/resourcehacker/reshack_setup.exe']64 bit Reshacker[/url]. I noticed that *take ownership* part took me quite a while.
I also have some more forthcoming icons but some have problems like the HL2 one which doesn't quite fit exactly so part of the *2* is discoloured but I might just throw it out there anyways for someone more skilled to figure it out ;D

item.title: Half life Win 7 start menu icon

item.description:
Alrighty then.

Thanks for the submittal magu2k

item.title: Half life Win 7 start menu icon
item.dc:creator: magu2k
item.description:
Your feedback is welcome. The logo originally had a narrow orange border around it but when I lit them up most of it disappeared but you can see some at the bottom of each icon. I left it in intentionally but if everyone thinks it’s better left out I can do that. Also welcome to modify this as you see fit, I woudl like to see improvements upon this.

Read full topic

item.title: Half life Win 7 start menu icon

item.description:
Not exactly to show off but I did sorta toss together this Half life icon as a replacement Windows 7 start button.


Right click to save

However before you jump too far read this article:
https://www.itechtalk.com/thread6574.html

It has full instructions. It is a bit of work to do this. But if you want to mess around more with W7 start menu buttons this is a start.

[COLOR=‘Red’]Note: If you are using x64 Windows you NEED to use 64 bit Reshacker.
I noticed that take ownership part took me quite a while.

I also have some more forthcoming icons but some have problems like the HL2 one which doesn’t quite fit exactly so part of the 2 is discoloured but I might just throw it out there anyways for someone more skilled to figure it out ;D
